attributes.action: Reduce the number of MPs allowed to sit in Parliament by 50%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are far too many MPs sitting in Parliament (the USA have less than us with a much greater population than us).  We call upon the Prime Minister to introduce a bill to cut the numbers allowed to take a seat in the House of Commons by half.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
